title: I get it, already!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ah... I can’t do this...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>What’s wrong, Honoka-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I can’t do this... I can’t do this anymore!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>W-what should I do...? I can only hear you out, but I think that saying what has you so worried could help you feel better...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I scored surprisingly terribly in the midterm exams, so Umi-chan and Eli-chan got mad at me... and at Nico-chan, too...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Surprisingly... terribly...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But listen! I already get that I did terribly! So don’t get so mad at me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’ll make me not want to try harder next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-I see... Thank you, Honoka-san! You’ve taught me something very important.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>??<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I tend to be strict with Kasumi-san, but that isn’t a good thing... I need to try to motivate her more instead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>E-exactly! That’s what’s important! It’ll help me think to do better next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s right. I need to encourage her to try to do better.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, yeah! You should do that! Also tell that to Umi-chan and Eli-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Understood! Leave it to me! And please do your best next time, Honoka-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course I will! If I remember to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
